snippet.title: Cygnus Enterprises-First Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out this trailer for Cygnus Enterprises, a sci-fi base-management & action Role-playing PC game developed by Team Miaozi, a NetEase Games studio. Wishlist Now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1963520/Cygnus_Enterprises

You've been recruited by Cygnus Enterprises to become a contractor tasked with repairing a derelict outpost on the remote planet Mytilus. Fight alien creatures, find precious loot, build a sprawling base, manage dozens of employees, and explore alien structures to gather the resources to build a thriving outpost.

More info: www.cygnusgame.com
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/cygnus_game
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/uvd4PVtS47 
Check us out on Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/CygnusGame/ 

#Steam #ARPG #PCGame #sandbox
